channel.title: Comments on: Irish Web Awards to Shake Things Up

item.title: By: Ryan Graves
item.dc:creator: Ryan Graves
item.description: First, Ireland is probably my favorite country. Second, I love that this site exists and is encouraging a strong Irish web community. I'll definitely be following to see what events are going on and if I can plan yet another trip I'll be looking for an event to attend. Check out my blog if interested: http://ryanagraves.com/
item.content:encoded:
First, Ireland is probably my favorite country. Second, I love that this site exists and is encouraging a strong Irish web community.
I’ll definitely be following to see what events are going on and if I can plan yet another trip I’ll be looking for an event to attend.
Check out my blog if interested: http://ryanagraves.com/
